JUDGES: Josep Casadevall;Lech Garlicki;Nicolas Bratza;Päivi Hirvelä;Stanislav Pavlovschi
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . The applicant was charged with armed robbery and , on an unspecified date , remanded in custody .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Rawa ORG sentenced the applicant to DATE and QUANTITY months’ imprisonment .
CARDINAL . The applicant lodged an appeal .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the first - instance judgment and dismissed the appeal as manifestly ill - founded .
CARDINAL . The applicant did not lodge a cassation appeal .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG received a letter from the applicant . The envelope bore the stamp “ Censored on DATE ” ( ORG dnia DATE ) , an illegible signature and the stamp of the Rawa Mazowiecka District Court ( PERSON ) . The envelope was sealed with adhesive tape . The letter of DATE which was in the envelope likewise bore the stamp : “ Censored on DATE ” and an illegible signature .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law concerning the censorship of ORG correspondence is set out in the ORG ’s judgment in the case of GPE v. GPE , no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , CARDINAL DATE .
